text: Love comes when you least expect it! On the season three premiere of Hollywood Medium, Tyler Henry sits down with Savannah Chrisley to have a reading. Savannah is joined by her dad Todd Chrisley, who had a reading with Tyler last season, and is in the other room giving his take on Tyler ’ s predictions for his daughter. Right off the bat, Tyler gets some information about Savannah ’ s love life. “ He ’ s having me joke about your love life. He ’ s wanting to say, ‘ It ’ s going to be fine, it ’ s going to be fine, ’ but he ’ s like, ‘ No one ’ s good enough for her,'” Tyler reveals to the reality star. “ Basically the gist of this is that they ’ re having me acknowledge that in order to move forward in
